gov.nasa.arc.mct.api.persistence
Interface PersistenceService

public interface PersistenceService

This interface defines the interface to the persistence provider in the platform. Instances of this interface can be obtained using the OSGI service lookup framework.

Method Detail

startRelatedOperations

void startRelatedOperations()
This method is invoked when starting a set of related persistence operations in the current thread. If the underlying persistence implementation is a database this will likely start a transaction. This method will generally only be used from code that operates outside the scope of an action, for example an action that does some processing in the background.

completeRelatedOperations

void completeRelatedOperations(boolean save)
This method is invoked when completing a set of related persistence operations. This method must be invoked following startRelatedOperations() and only a single time. T

Parameters:
save - if the operation should be saved, false if the operation should not be saved.

hasComponentsTaggedBy

boolean hasComponentsTaggedBy(java.lang.String tagId)
Checks if tagId is used on at least one component in the database.

Parameters:
tagId - tag ID
Returns:
true there are components tagged with tagId; false, otherwise.

getComponent

<T extends AbstractComponent> T getComponent(java.lang.String externalKey,
                                             java.lang.Class<T> componentType)
Returns the component with the specified external key and component type.

Type Parameters:
T - type of component
Parameters:
externalKey - to use for search criteria
componentType - to use with external key
Returns:
instance of component with the given type or null if the component cannot be found.
